title: Kicked out of ranked champ select for no reason...
body: Just was told I "left" champ select and given a dodge timer and LP loss when I selected my champion and did literally nothing else except wait for the match to start. What in the actual hell? How does this happen?

replies.body: I HAVE THE SAME PROBLEM. SO TIRING.
Are you on the new client? If yes, this isn't a new thing. It's been an issue for months.
I've heard of getting a black screen, but not about it literally forcing a dodge as the timer counts down to the load in after everyone has picked. I am using the new client, though.
